Opcode.name: PCM_OP_PRICE_SET_PRICE_LIST
Opcode.Doc: Commits pricing objects to the BRM database.

Poid.name: PIN_FLD_POID
Poid.Doc: Dummy poid used for database only.

String.name: PIN_FLD_PROGRAM_NAME
String.Doc: Program Name for the event creation.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PLAN_LISTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold planlist info.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be DELETED rather than add/replaced.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the object.If not set then name will be copied to code.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS
Enum.Doc: STATUS field, the available values are PIN_STATUS_DEFUNCT = 0, PIN_STATUS_ACTIVE = 10100, PIN_STATUS_INACTIVE = 10102, PIN_STATUS_CLOSED = 10103, PIN_STATUS_NOT_SET = 10104.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PLAN
Array.Doc: Plan Array - array of plans in the planlist. At least one array element is required

String.name: PIN_FLD_NAME
String.Doc: Name of plan, in case of PDC, it will contain the code value.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PLAN
Array.Doc: Array to hold plan info. Each element is a plan obj representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be DELETED rather than add/replaced.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the object.If not set then name will be copied to code.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEAL_NAME
String.Doc: Account level deal name to purchase. If PDC is enabled then it will hold the code value of the object otherwise it will hold the name value of the object.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: On demand billing flags

Array.name: PIN_FLD_SERVICES
Array.Doc: Service array. Each element represents a service object to create and specifies information to use during the creation. Element-id is not significant.

Poid.name: PIN_FLD_SERVICE_OBJ
Poid.Doc: Partial poid of service object to create. The 'type' and 'database' sub-fields are used in the creation. The other sub-fields are ignored.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEAL_NAME
String.Doc: Service level deal to purchase. If PDC is enabled then it will hold the code value of the object otherwise it will hold the name value of the object.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SUBSCRIPTION_INDEX
Int.Doc: The index of the subscription service. This value should be one of the element id of the PIN_FLD_SERVICES array.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_INFO_INDEX
Int.Doc: This must be greater than or equal to 0. If this is greater than 0 then there must be a corresponding bal info array exist with this index value.

String.name: PIN_FLD_SERVICE_ID
String.Doc: Unique service id for this instance

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DEALS
Array.Doc: PIN_FLD_DEALS array. to hold the required and optional deals.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: The type of this deal. Required or Optional

Array.name: PIN_FLD_LIMIT
Array.Doc: Limit array. Credit limits to be set for the account. Element-ids match the balance element whose limit is to be set.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_LIMIT
Decimal.Doc: Credit limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_FLOOR
Decimal.Doc: Credit floor.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_THRESHOLDS
Int.Doc: New Limit.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLDS
Array.Doc: Array to hold account level fixed threshold values.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD
Int.Doc: Account level fixed threshold value.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Account level decimal fixed threshold value.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RULES
Array.Doc: Consumption Rules array.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_CONSUMPTION_RULE
Enum.Doc: Consumption Rules array.Consumption rule to be applied on the resource. Possible values are EST(1), LST(2), EET(3), LET(4), ESTLET(5), ESTEET(6), LSTEET(7), LSTLET(8), EETEST(9), EETLST(10), LETEST(11), LETLST(12).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_INFO
Array.Doc: Balance info array.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_LIMIT
Array.Doc: Array of credit limit to be set up.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_FLOOR
Decimal.Doc: Service level credit floor.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_LIMIT
Decimal.Doc: Service level credit limit. The maximum amount of this resource that a customer can owe.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CREDIT_THRESHOLDS
Int.Doc: Bit flags are triggering when resource balance cross a boundary when increasing in value.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLDS
Array.Doc: Array to hold service level fixed threshold values.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD
Int.Doc: Service level fixed threshold value.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Account level decimal fixed threshold value.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RULES
Array.Doc: Consumption Rules array.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_CONSUMPTION_RULE
Enum.Doc: Consumption Rules array.Consumption rule to be applied on the resource. Possible values are EST(1), LST(2), EET(3), LET(4), ESTLET(5), ESTEET(6), LSTEET(7), LSTLET(8), EETEST(9), EETLST(10), LETEST(11), LETLST(12).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BEST_PRICING
Array.Doc: Best pricing array.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be DELETED rather than add/replaced.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEAL_NAME
String.Doc: Name of the unique base deal for this /best_pricing instance.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEAL_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the unique base deal for this /best_pricing instance, mandatory field if PDC is enabled.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_APPLY_MODE
Enum.Doc: Mode of Best Pricing application: Full rerate (0x1), One time adjustment (0x2).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DEALS
Array.Doc: Array to hold the alternate deals.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEAL_CODE
String.Doc: Code of an alternate deal, mandatory field if PDC is enabled.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_MINIMUM
Decimal.Doc: Minimum charge for the alternate deal.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_CONDITIONS
Array.Doc: Conditions for Best Pricing consideration. If the conditions are met the deal will be considered by Best Pricing.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESOURCE_ID
Int.Doc: ID of resource used for the Best Pricing condition.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Amount against which the condition will be compared.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_OPERATOR
Enum.Doc: Conditional operator: (0x0) equal to, (0x1) not equal to, (0x2) less than, (0x3) greater than, (0x4) less than or equal to, (0x5) greater than or equal to .

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DEPENDENCIES
Array.Doc: Array to hold dependency info. Each element is a dependency object representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: To indicate if the item is to be deleted rather than add/replaced.

Poid.name: PIN_FLD_DEPENDEE_OBJ
Poid.Doc: Poid of dependee object. Only used to know the type of object.

Poid.name: PIN_FLD_DEPENDENT_OBJ
Poid.Doc: Poid of dependent object. Only used to know the type of object.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEPENDEE_CODE
String.Doc: Code of dependee object, mandatory field if PDC is enabled.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DEPENDENT_CODE
String.Doc: Code of dependent object, mandatory field if PDC is enabled.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Type of dependency (1 = prereq, 2 = mutex)

Array.name: PIN_FLD_TRANSITIONS
Array.Doc: Array to hold transition info. Each element is a transition obj representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be deleted rather than add/replaced.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FEE_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to decide what fees are to be applied.

String.name: PIN_FLD_FROM_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the FROM object, mandatory field if PDC is enabled

Poid.name: PIN_FLD_FROM_OBJ
Poid.Doc: Poid type of the FROM object

String.name: PIN_FLD_TO_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the TO object, mandatory field if PDC is enabled

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid start time - defines valid period for transition object (inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid end time - defines valid period for transition object (non-inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone. If end time is zero, valid period does not expire.

String.name: PIN_FLD_PERMITTED
String.Doc: PERMITED field. Mandatory in case of plan->plan transition.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Type of the transition:Upgrade=0, Downgrade=1.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DEALS
Array.Doc: Array to hold deal info. Each element is a deal obj representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be deleted rather than add/replaced.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the object.If not set then name will be copied to code.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Deal customization flags.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid start time - defines valid period for deal object (inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid end time - defines valid period for deal object (non-inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone. If end time is zero, valid period does not expire.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PRODUCTS
Array.Doc: Products Array - array of products to purchase for the deal.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Non-modifiable code of product to purchase.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_QUANTITY
Decimal.Doc: Quantity to purchase

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_DISCOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Purchase discount - percent discount applied to purchase/cancel rates of product

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_DISCOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Cycle fee discount - percent discount applied to cycle rates of product

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_DISCOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Usage fee discount - percent discount applied to usage rates of product

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: The 24th bit of PIN_FLD_FLAGS is on then it is a resources as a group.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Purchase relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate purchase is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: Purchase relative start unit. This field is not required when the purchase validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Purchase relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Purchase relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Cycle relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate cycle is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: Cycle relative start unit. This field is not required when the cycle validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Cycle relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Cycle relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Usage relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate cycle is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: Usage relative start unit. This field is not required when the usage validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Usage relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Usage relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS
Enum.Doc: Initial status of the product that is being purchased. Legal values are ACTIVE (1) and INACTIVE (2).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Inital status flags

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNTS
Array.Doc: Discounts Array - array of discounts to purchase for the deal.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Non-modifiable code of discount to purchase

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_QUANTITY
Decimal.Doc: Quantity to purchase

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Purchase relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate purchase is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: Purchase relative start unit. This field is not required when the purchase validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Purchase relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Purchase relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Cycle relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate cycle is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: Cycle relative start unit. This field is not required when the cycle validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Cycle relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Cycle relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Usage relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate usage is based on first usage. A value 0 indicates start immediately.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_START_UNIT
Int.Doc: This field is not required when the usage validity is based on First Usage. To start immediately the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Usage relative end offset

Int.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_END_UNIT
Int.Doc: Usage relative end unit. To end never the unit can be anything but the offset to be sent as 0. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Accounting Cycles=8

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS
Enum.Doc: Initial status of the product that is being purchased.Active(1) and Inactive(2)

Int.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Inital status flags

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PRODUCTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold product info. Each element is a product obj representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be deleted rather than add/replaced.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Product type - Product type - products are item(601), subscription/ongoing(602) and system(603).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE
Int.Doc: A value 1 indicates a tailor made product

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Value decides whether partial updates are to be done on the product. Value can be 1 or 0. 1 = Allow partial update, 0 = Full update. For full update, if the field is missing or the value is 0, the input is treated as the complete snapshot of the product. Default value is 0.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid start time - defines valid period for product object (inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone. Default value is 0 that indicates product is active immediately.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Valid end time - defines valid period for product object (non-inclusive) Stored as desired time in server timezone. Default value is 0 that indicates product is valid for ever from the start time.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_MIN
Decimal.Doc: Purchase Minimum - minimum quantity that can be purchased at a single time. Test is non-inclusive - quantity must be greater than min. Default value is NULL that indicates no minimum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_MAX
Decimal.Doc: Purchase Maximum - maximum quantity that can be purchased at a single time. Test is inclusive - quantity must be less than equal to max. Default value is NULL that indicates no maximum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_OWN_MIN
Decimal.Doc: Ownership Minimum - minimum quantity that can be owned at any time. Test is non-inclusive - quantity must be greater than min. Default value is NULL that indicates no minimum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_OWN_MAX
Decimal.Doc: Ownership Maximum - maximum quantity that can be owned at any time. Test is inclusive - quantity must be less than equal to max. Default value is NULL that indicates no maximum limit.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_PARTIAL
Enum.Doc: Partial parameter - determines if fractional quantities can be purchased and/or owned. Default value is 0.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PRIORITY
Decimal.Doc: Priority - used to resolve ordering of product application. Default value is 0.

String.name: PIN_FLD_PERMITTED
String.Doc: Permitted - contains a single type string for account or service object types that is permitted to purchase this product. The entry is implicitly appended with a wildcard for checking, so account or service types that were inherited from a permitted type are also permitted themselves. No entry implies any account or service type is permitted to purchase the product.

String.name: PIN_FLD_PROVISIONING_TAG
String.Doc: Provisioning tag - used with PCM_OP_BILL_POL_{PURCHASE, CANCEL}_PROD_PROVISIONING

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TAX_SUPPLIER
Int.Doc: Tax supplier.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_MAP
Array.Doc: Usage map (optional)

String.name: PIN_FLD_RUM_NAME
String.Doc: Specifies which RUM should be used to rate this event type.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TOD_MODE
Enum.Doc: TOD mode defines how tod rate are applied to the event.START_TIME(0), END_TIME(1), TIMED(2). Default value is 0.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TIMEZONE_MODE
Enum.Doc: It defines which timezoneto use when apply TOD rates.Value can be EVENT(0), SERVER(1), ACCOUNT(2). Default value is 0.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_MIN_QUANTITY
Decimal.Doc: Minimum value that the RUM quantity is rounded to. Default value is 1.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Specify if this usage map is valid for the product at certain status.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_MIN_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Unit min quantity is expressed in. The values could be (0)None, (1)Minute, (2)Second, (3)Hour, (4)Day, 11(Byte), 12(Kilobyte), 13(Megabyte), 14(Gigabyte). Default value is 0.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_INCR_QUANTITY
Decimal.Doc: Increment value to round RUM quantity to. Default value is 1.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_INCR_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Units that INCR_QUANTITY specified in. The values could be (0)None, (1)Minute, (2)Second, (3)Hour, (4)Day, 11(Byte), 12(Kilobyte), 13(Megabyte), 14(Gigabyte). Default value is 0.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_ROUNDING_MODE
Enum.Doc: Rounding mode. The values could be 0(Nearest), 1(Up), 2(Down). Default value is 0.

String.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_PLAN_CODE
String.Doc: Rate plan code, If not set then name will be copied to code.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Selector code, If not set then name will be copied to code.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RUM_MAP
Array.Doc: Rum map. Set of rums with which events will be rated in the multi-rum case. If RUM_MAP is null this falls back to the single rum case.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RUM_LIST
Array.Doc: Rum list. The list of rums to be considered while rating the event in PIN_FLD_EVENT_TYPE.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_PLANS
Array.Doc: Rate Plan array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_NAME
String.Doc: Name of the rate plan object.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the rate plan object, If not set then name will be copied to code.

String.name: PIN_FLD_EVENT_TYPE
String.Doc: Type of the event that this rate_plan specifies rating for.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CYCLE_FEE_FLAGS
Int.Doc: When to apply cycle fee.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_CURRENCY
Int.Doc: Currency resource that this rate plan impacts.

String.name: PIN_FLD_TAX_CODE
String.Doc: Identifier used by the tax engine to calculate tax for this rate.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TAX_WHEN
Enum.Doc: When to apply taxes on the rate charges. The values could be 0(no taxes), 1(tax when the event occurs), 2(defer to the end of the accounting or billing cycle. Default value is 0.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_BILL_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Specifies the offset to bill in advance.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_OFFSET_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Specefies the unit of measure of the above field.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_TIERS
Array.Doc: Rate tier array.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PRIORITY
Decimal.Doc: Priority of the rate tier.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_DATE_RANGE_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Specify which type of the date ranges are used in this tier. Value can be absolute(0), relative(1).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_INDEX
Int.Doc: Rate index.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DATE_RANGES
Array.Doc: Array of date ranges.

String.name: PIN_FLD_LINEAGE
String.Doc: The array index of its ancestors separated by'.'.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive start time of the validity period for the rate.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive end time of the validity period for the rate.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Offset value from product purchase for start of relative date range.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Offset value from product purchase for end of relative date range.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Value can be second(1), minute(2), hour(3), or day(4).

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Value can be second(1), minute(2), hour(3), or day(4).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_INDEX
Int.Doc: Rate Index.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DAY_RANGES
Array.Doc: Day range array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_LINEAGE
String.Doc: The array index of its ancestors separated by'.'.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_DOW
Int.Doc: Valid day-of-week flag.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_DOM
Int.Doc: Valid day-of-month flag.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_MOY
Int.Doc: Valid month-of-year flag.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_INDEX
Int.Doc: Rate index.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_TOD_RANGES
Array.Doc: Array of valid daily time ranges for the rate object.

String.name: PIN_FLD_LINEAGE
String.Doc: The array index of its ancestors separated by'.'.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Valid start offset-seconds from begining of the day.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Valid end offset-seconds from begining of the day.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_INDEX
Int.Doc: Rate index.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RATES
Array.Doc: Rate array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE_DATA
String.Doc: all resources along ith their percentage override. The data will be stored as "USD,-20;MIN,-20".

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_FIRST
Enum.Doc: Prorating option for the first cycle the product is owned. You can charge for a whole month (701), prorate the charge based on the days left in the month (702), or not charge for the partial month (703). Used only for cycle fees rates.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_LAST
Enum.Doc: Prorating option for the last cycle the product is owned. You can charge for a whole month (701), prorate the charge based on the days left in the month (702), or not charge for the partial month (703). Used only for cycle fees rates.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: The type of the rate determines its applicability for the various rate stack passes. Values are Normal (0), Default (740) and Default-only (741). 'Normal' rates honor credit limits and 'Default' rates override credit limits.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_STEP_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Specifies the type of quantity that quantity tiering steps on. values can be TOTAL_QUANTITY_RATED(0), QUANTITY_RATED_PER_RATE(1), and RESOURCE_QUANTITY(2) . If the value is RESOURCE_QUANTITY, step_resource need to be specified as well.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_QUANTITY_TIERS
Array.Doc: Quantity array.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_STEP_MIN
Decimal.Doc: Min quantity of event that can use this tier.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_STEP_MAX
Decimal.Doc: Max quantity of event that can use this tier.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_IMPACTS
Array.Doc: Balance impact array.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_ELEMENT_ID
Int.Doc: Numeric value of the resource to be impacted.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GL_ID
Int.Doc: Gl id to be used when impacting the resource associated with this balance impact.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_FIXED_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Fixed balance amount.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_SCALED_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Scaled balance amount.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_SCALED_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Unit scaled_amount is expressed in. Value can be NONE(0), SECOND(1), MINUTE(2), HOUR(3), or DAY(4).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Balance impact flags.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive start time of the validity period for the balance impact.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive end time of the validity period for the balance impact..

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_CYCLE_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Offset value in cycles for the relative date range.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Provide the relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate first usage.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Provide the relative start units such as sec, min, hour, day, months, and cycles. This field is not required when the First Usage flag is 1. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Event Cycles=7, Accounting Cycles=8, Billing Cycles=9

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Provide the relative start offset.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Provide the relative end units such as sec, min, hour, day, months, and cycles. Unit in terms of Seconds=1, Minutes=2, Hours=3, Days=4, Months=5, Event Cycles=7, Accounting Cycles=8, Billing Cycles=9

Array.name: PIN_FLD_ROLLOVERS
Array.Doc: Rollover array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Code of the rollover object, If not set then name will be copied to code.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive start time of the validity period for the rollover.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive end time of the validity period for the rollover.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_DATE_RANGE_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Specify which type of the date ranges are used in this tier. Value can be absolute(0), relative(1).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Provide the relative start offset. A value -1 to indicate first usage.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Offset value from end date.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_START_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Unit of measure for relative start offset.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RELATIVE_END_UNIT
Enum.Doc: Unit of measure for relative end offset.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_IMPACTS
Array.Doc: Balance impact array.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESOURCE_ID
Int.Doc: Numeric value of the resource to be impacted.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GL_ID
Int.Doc: Gl id associated with balance group.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_ROLLOVER_MAX_UNITS
Decimal.Doc: Maximum quantity that can be rollovered.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_ROLLOVER_UNITS
Decimal.Doc: Quantity to rollover per period.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_ROLLOVER_UOM
Enum.Doc: Specifies the unit of measure (days or months) of the field PIN_FLD_ROLLOVER_UNITS.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_ROLLOVER_COUNT
Int.Doc: Max times to rollover.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_FIRST
Enum.Doc: Prorating option for the first cycle the product is owned. You can charge for a whole month (701), prorate the charge based on the days left in the month (702), or not charge for the partial month (703). Used only for cycle fees rates.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_LAST
Enum.Doc: Prorating option for the last cycle the product is owned. You can charge for a whole month (701), prorate the charge based on the days left in the month (702), or not charge for the partial month (703). Used only for cycle fees rates.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PIPELINE_RATEPLANS
Array.Doc: Array of pipeline rate plans.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE
Int.Doc: A value 1 Indicates it is a tailor made rate plan

String.name: PIN_FLD_RATE_PLAN_CODE
String.Doc: Unique Pipeline Rate plan code stored in products usage map

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VERSION_ID
Int.Doc: Rate plan version number reuired for modify rate plan details

Int.name: PIN_FLD_ZONEMODEL
Int.Doc: zone model

Int.name: PIN_FLD_BASIC
Int.Doc: basic

Array.name: PIN_FLD_RATEPLAN_CNF
Array.Doc: Array of pipeline rate plans that are customized by providing a percentage.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TIME_ZONE
Int.Doc: Time Zone

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TIME_MODEL
Int.Doc: Time model

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PRICE_MODEL_INDEX
Int.Doc: price model index. This index will be element Id in price models definition

Int.name: PIN_FLD_MODEL_SELECTOR_INDEX
Int.Doc: price model index. This index will be element Id in price models definition

Int.name: PIN_FLD_ALT_PRICE_MODEL
Int.Doc: Alt Price model

Array.name: PIN_FLD_MODEL_SELECTORS
Array.Doc: Model selectors. The element Id of this array will be referred in the pin_fld_rateplan_cnf as pin_fld_model_selector_index

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE
Int.Doc: A value 1 Indicates it is a tailor made model selector

Array.name: PIN_FLD_SELCTOR_RULESET
Array.Doc: Array of selector ruleset.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SELECTOR_RULE_INDEX
Int.Doc: Selector Rule index will be one of the element in selector rules

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_FROM
Timestamp.Doc: Valid from

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_TO
Timestamp.Doc: Valid to

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RANK
Int.Doc: rank

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PRICE_MODEL_INDEX
Int.Doc: Price model index. This will be one of the element in price models

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PRICE_MODELS
Array.Doc: price models. The element Id of this array will be referred in the pin_fld_rateplan_cnf as pin_fld_price_model_index

Int.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE
Int.Doc: A value 1 Indicates it is a tailor made price model

String.name: PIN_FLD_TAILORMADE_DATA
String.Doc: percentage override, and list of resource names for which the percentage was applied. For e.g. 'USD,-10;EURO,10'

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DECIMAL_PLACES
Int.Doc: Decimal Places

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PRICE_MODEL_STEPS
Array.Doc: Array of pipeline price model steps.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_STEP
Int.Doc: Price Model step number

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD_FROM
Decimal.Doc: Threshold range from number

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD_TO
Decimal.Doc: Threshold range to number

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_BEAT
Decimal.Doc: The charge beat

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CHARGE_AMT
Decimal.Doc: The charge amount

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_CHARGE_BASE
Decimal.Doc: The charge base

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FRAME
Int.Doc: frame

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_MIN_CHARGE
Decimal.Doc: The minimum charge amount

Array.name: PIN_FLD_SELCTOR_RULES
Array.Doc: Array of selector rules. The element Id will be selector rule seq

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SELECTOR_DETAIL_INDEX
Int.Doc: This will be one of the element Id of pin_fld_selector_details

Array.name: PIN_FLD_SELCTOR_DETAILS
Array.Doc: Array of selector details. The element Id will be selector rule seq

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNTS
Array.Doc: Discounts array.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_TYPE
Enum.Doc: Discount type:item(PIN_DISC_TYPE_ITEM-601), subscription(PIN_DISC_TYPE_ONGOING-602, PIN_DISC_TYPE_SYSTEM-603).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Value decides whether partial updates are to be done on the discount. Value can be 1 or 0. 1 = Allow partial update, 0 = Full update. For full update, if any existing usage map entry does not present in the input then it will be deleted. Default value is 0.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive absolute start time of the validity period for the product. Default value is 0(starts immediately).

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive absolute end time of the validity period for the product. Default value is 0(ends never).

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_MIN
Decimal.Doc: Purchase Minimum - minimum quantity that can be purchased at a single time. Test is non-inclusive - quantity must be greater than min. A value of NULL means no minimum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PURCHASE_MAX
Decimal.Doc: Purchase Maximum - maximum quantity that can be purchased at a single time. Test is inclusive - quantity must be less than equal to max. A value of NULL means no maximum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_OWN_MIN
Decimal.Doc: Ownership Minimum - minimum quantity that can be owned at any time. Test is non-inclusive - quantity must be greater than min. A value of NULL means no minimum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_OWN_MAX
Decimal.Doc: Ownership Maximum - maximum quantity that can be owned at any time. Test is inclusive - quantity must be less than equal to max. A value of NULL means no maximum limit.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_PRIORITY
Decimal.Doc: Priority of the discount. Default value is 0.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_MODE
Enum.Doc: Discount mode - parallel(801) or cascade(802) or sequential(803).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_MAP
Array.Doc: Array of usage map.

String.name: PIN_FLD_EVENT_TYPE
String.Doc: Type of event that this entry specifies discount for.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_MODEL
String.Doc: Discount model. Either PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_MODEL or PIN_FLD_MODEL_SELECTOR field has to be populated.

String.name: PIN_FLD_MODEL_SELECTOR
String.Doc: Model selector. Model selector has to pre-exist. Either PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_MODEL or PIN_FLD_MODEL_SELECTOR field has to be populated.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Stop discounting flag.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SNOWBALL_FLAG
Int.Doc: Snowball flag.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_CYCLE_VALIDITY
Array.Doc: Array of entries defining the discount rules for cycle events.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_FLAGS
Enum.Doc: The valid values are full(1), prorate(2), no(3).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_USAGE_VALIDITY
Array.Doc: Array of entries defining the discount rules for usage events.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_FLAGS
Enum.Doc: The valid values are full(1), prorate(2), no(3).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PIPELINE_DISC_MODELS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount model details. This field need to be passed only to create/update/reuse discount model which is being used in PIN_FLD_USAGE_MAP array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CHARGESHARE_FLAG
String.Doc: Charge share flag. Value is '0' for discount model.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MODEL_VERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount model version.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VERSION_ID
Int.Doc: Model version.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_FROM
Timestamp.Doc: Valid from time - defines from when this is valid.

String.name: PIN_FLD_STATUS_STR
String.Doc: Status of this discount model version (A=active, D=deactive, T=test, S=simulation).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MODEL_CNFS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount model configuration.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RANK
Int.Doc: Defines the order of configuration entries within a discount model.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_MODE
Int.Doc: Discount mode. Use entry only if previous rank is completed (completely used).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database discount configuration sequence value. Required for update case.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_TRIGGERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount trigger.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_CONDS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount condition. This field is required for new teigger.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_COND_VALUE
Int.Doc: Condition value.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database discount condition sequence value. Required for update case.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_RULES
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount rules.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_STEPS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount rule steps. This field is required for new rule.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RANK
Int.Doc: Defines the order of configuration entries within a discount rule.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD_FROM
Int.Doc: Lower boundary threshold from when on this discount step is valid.

String.name: PIN_FLD_THRESHOLD_TO_STR
String.Doc: Lower boundary threshold upto when on this discount stagger step is valid.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_PURCHASE
Int.Doc: Prorate purchase.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_PRORATE_CANCEL
Int.Doc: Prorate cancel.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_IMPACTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount balance impact.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESOURCE_ID
Int.Doc: Resource id.

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_AMOUNT
Decimal.Doc: Amount in fixed or percentage.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GRANT_BEAT
Int.Doc: Grant beat.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GRANT_PRORATED_BEAT
Int.Doc: Grant prorate value.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_EVENT_BAL_ID
Int.Doc: Event balance id.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_OWNER_FLAG
Int.Doc: Discount owner flag.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_FROM
Timestamp.Doc: Valid from time.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_TO
Timestamp.Doc: Valid to time.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GRANT_PERIOD_OFFSET
Int.Doc: Grant period offset.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_GRANT_PERIOD_UNIT
Int.Doc: Grant period unit.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FIRST_USAGE
Int.Doc: First usage.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database balance impact sequence value. Required for update case.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MASTERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount master.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNT_DETAILS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount detail. This field is required for new master.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RANK
Int.Doc: Defines the order of configuration entries within a discount model.

String.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_FROM_STR
String.Doc: Valid from time - defines from when the condition is valid.

String.name: PIN_FLD_VALID_TO_STR
String.Doc: Valid from time - defines till when the condition is valid.

String.name: PIN_FLD_TIME_FROM_STR
String.Doc: Optional time starting interval within the valid date range.

String.name: PIN_FLD_TIME_TO_STR
String.Doc: Optional time ending interval within the valid date range.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_SPONSORSHIPS
Array.Doc: Sponsorship array.

String.name: PIN_FLD_CODE
String.Doc: Unique code of the sponsorship.If not set then name will be copied to code.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_START_T
Timestamp.Doc: Inclusive absolute start time.

Timestamp.name: PIN_FLD_END_T
Timestamp.Doc: Non-Inclusive end time of the validity period for the object.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_USAGE_MAP
Array.Doc: Array of entries defining how sponsorship should be performed for different events.

String.name: PIN_FLD_EVENT_TYPE
String.Doc: Type of event that this entry specifies the discount for.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_FLAGS
Int.Doc: Specifies if this usage map is valid if the sponsorship instance is at certain status.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_OFFER_PROFILES
Array.Doc: Offer Profile Array.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_DELETED_FLAG
Int.Doc: Flag to indicate if the item is to be deleted rather than add or replaced.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_POLICY_LABELS
Array.Doc: Array to hold policy label info.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESOURCE_ID
Int.Doc: Resource id.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_UNIT
Enum.Doc:
Unit of the resource. The values could be (0)None, (1)Second, (2)Minute, (3)Hour, (4)Day, 11(Byte), 12(Kilobyte), 13(Megabyte), 14(Gigabyte). Default value is 0.
0,1,2,3,4,11,12,13,14

Array.name: PIN_FLD_TIERS
Array.Doc: Tier Array

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_TIER_START_RANGE
Decimal.Doc: Start tier range

Decimal.name: PIN_FLD_TIER_END_RANGE
Decimal.Doc: End tier range

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RESULT
Enum.Doc: Result flag indicating if the commit happened as planned. Validation errors may be returned, even if the OP succeeds without ebuf error. This will either be pass(1) or fail(0).

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PRODUCTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold product info. Each element is a product obj representation.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESULT_FORMAT
Int.Doc: Contains a more explanatory enum value for why it failed.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DESCR
String.Doc: If there is a validation error, this contains additional message text.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISCOUNTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount info.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_PIPELINE_DISC_MODELS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount model details.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database discount model sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MODEL_VERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount model version.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_VERSION_ID
Int.Doc: Model version.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MODEL_CNFS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount trigger.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database trigger sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_TRIGGERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount trigger.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database trigger sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_CONDS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount condition.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database condition sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_RULES
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount rules.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database rule sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_STEPS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount stepss.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database rule sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_BAL_IMPACTS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount balance impacts.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database balance impact sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_DISC_MASTERS
Array.Doc: Array to hold discount master.

Int.name: PIN_FLD_SEQUENCE_NUM
Int.Doc: Database master sequence.

Array.name: PIN_FLD_OFFER_PROFILES
Array.Doc: Array to hold Offer Profile info.

Enum.name: PIN_FLD_RESULT
Enum.Doc: Result flag indicating if the commit happened as planned. Validation errors may be returned, even if the opcode succeeds without ebuf error. This will either be 1(pass) or 0(fail).

Int.name: PIN_FLD_RESULT_FORMAT
Int.Doc: Contains a more explanatory enum value for why it failed.

String.name: PIN_FLD_DESCR
String.Doc: If there is a validation error, contains additional message text.
